casebody.data:
Charles E. FORBES, Appellant, v. Sam L. GROSS, U. S. Marshal for Northern District of Texas, Appellee.* Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit November 14, 1927. No. 4972. W. B. Harrell, of Dallas, Tex., for appellant. Norman A. Dodge, U. S. Atty., Arnold Davis, Asst. U. S. Atty., and J. Forrest McCutchcon, Asst. U. S. Atty., all of Fort Worth, Tex., for appellee.

*1012Before WALKER, BRYAN, and FOSTER, Circuit Judges.

Rehearing denied December 20, 1927.

 PER CURIAM.

The order appealed from is affirmed.
